title: mediterranean couscous salad
ingredients: 1 small carton good cherry tomatoes; cut in half
1 red pepper; small dice (optional, as a replacement for tomatoes)
instructions: Boil 1.5 cups of water with a pinch of salt in a small saucepan.  Once it's boiling, add couscous and stir, take
Combine veggies and dressing to let marinate while couscous steams.
Top couscous with veggie salad.  Top that with optional sliced avocados.  Add more dressing if necessary.
notes: If really getting fancy, could add chopped parsley. If using persian cucumbers prep 2-3 instead of 1. For chickpeas, I prefer *Goya* brand. Vegan if the dressing is cheese free.
